Literature.Title: Characterization of simplified nonapeptides with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activities as potential food preservatives, and their antibacterial mechanism.
Literature.Author: Yang Z, Wei Y, Wu W, Zhang L, Wang J, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:12% Cell death=32 µM
